CustomField.formula:
TEXT(YEAR( EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Date__c )) +'-'+ IF(MONTH( EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Date__c ) < 10, '0' + TEXT(MONTH( EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Date__c )), TEXT(MONTH( EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Date__c ))) +'-'+
IF(DAY( EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Date__c ) < 10, '0' + TEXT(DAY( EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Date__c )), TEXT(DAY( EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Date__c ))) + 'T' +
IF(CONTAINS(EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Time__c,'PM'), TEXT( VALUE(LEFT(EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Time__c, FIND(":", EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Time__c)-1)) + 12 ) & ':' & TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(RIGHT(EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Time__c,(LEN(EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Time__c)-FIND(":", EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Time__c))),' AM',''),' PM','')) & ':00' , IF(VALUE(LEFT(EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Time__c, FIND(":", EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Time__c)-1)) < 10,'0','')& TEXT( VALUE(LEFT(EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Time__c, FIND(":", EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Time__c)-1))) & ':' & TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(RIGHT(EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Time__c,(LEN(EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Time__c)-FIND(":", EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__End_Time__c))),' AM',''),' PM','')) & ':00' )
CustomField.label: Outlook Event End Date
